hero.desc: Gesture OS Manager is a desktop solution that recognizes hand motions from camera input and controls your computer across multiple modes such as mouse, keyboard, and presentations. It clearly displays the current state (mode/tracking/lock) to reduce confusion during real use, focusing on a flow you can learn quickly and use right away.

features.title: Key features
features.desc: What you actually feel while using it

core.title: Core
core.desc: An integrated solution that controls your computer with gesture-based input and supports real-time interaction.

arch.title: Architecture
arch.desc: The Manager (settings/guides) and the Agent (recognition/input/HUD) run separately. You adjust modes and options in the Manager, while the Agent handles actual input.

flow.title: Usage flow
flow.desc: Choose a mode → confirm tracking → perform a gesture → check the feedback. Since the current state is shown on screen, you don’t need to guess “why it isn’t working.”

env.title: Supported environment
env.desc: We provide a Windows desktop application (.exe).

version.title: Version 1.0
version.desc: The current release is version 1.0 and includes Mouse, Keyboard, Presentation, and Keyboard modes. Additional content such as the RUSH game is also available.

recommend.label: Recommended
recommend.text: Recognition is most stable with consistent lighting and a fixed camera.

status.title: Status
status.desc: The desktop version is currently being prepared for distribution.
